name: Tower of Justice

keyEvents.description: Kaku bisects the entire tower with his Rankyaku: Amane Dachi technique, causing the top portion to shift dramatically
keyEvents.significance: The tower suffers massive structural damage, demonstrating the destructive power of CP9's techniques and creating chaos during the battles

keyEvents.description: Multiple simultaneous battles occur throughout the tower - Zoro and Sogeking vs. Kaku and Jabra, Franky vs. Fukurou, Sanji vs. Kalifa, and Nami vs. Kumadori
keyEvents.significance: The Tower of Justice serves as the primary battleground for the Straw Hats' confrontation with CP9

description: The Tower of Justice is a massive government building on Enies Lobby where the CP9 agents conduct their battles against the Straw Hat Pirates. The tower contains multiple floors and rooms where simultaneous battles take place.
